channel.title: General Skinnycorp Awesome Crazy Hifi Amp on Writing by Harper Reed

item.title: all sorts of firey goodness.
item.description: today was pretty fun. but first the weekend. My brother came over and hugn out this weekend. we pretty much just played video games. heh. on thrusday we went to sushi wabi. which was really nice. then we went to bed. we got up earlish on friday and dylan accompanied me to work. it was quite fun. we hung out and he fit in really well. he did a bunch of magic tricks for everyone.
